title: This guy's such a painful to watch (but unfortunately successful) beacon to liberals

embed.description: John Oliver on The Charleston Shooting and Russia's Crazyness john oliver full show charleston shooting confederate flag racist russia charleston investigation video jon stewart on charleston Comedy (Theater Genre),Shooting Sport (Sport),Russia (Country),Soviet Union (Country),Crazy,North,South,charleston shooting,footage,new

body:
This guy's so backwards holy shit

"the flag was racist ever since they stitched the first one"
Ya a brit doesn't know american history, fucking surprise

"Russians are crazy imagine we had dead whales on the highway xD"
????????

"women only got the 10 dollar bill why not the 20 :D 20 is better than 10"
Ya, and 100 is better than 20 what's your point?

But of course the comments are licking his sweaty pooper
